descriptionHtml:
The Mage Armor perk doesn't work with Morokei, even though it doesn't have any armor value and should be classified as clothing. I fixed it so it works.

Also changed all the other dragon masks to the same thing (no longer give armor, but let you use the mage armor perk).

Load after SkyRe, and run the re-proccer afterwards, otherwise it doesn't work.

Note: If this doesn't actually work, just open the damn thing in Tes5Edit, and copy it over into SkyRe_main itself, then run the re-proccer.
author: Celicni
